name: Vigor: Rise from the Dust Pack
name_original: Vigor: Rise from the Dust Pack
description:
Rise from the radioactive dust with this exclusive bundle. Loot resources, experience tense Encounters, and build your Shelter. Play on your own or fight together. That is all it takes to outlive the apocalypse!

Get ready to fight the other Outlanders in the unique hazmat suite and use the load of weapons to survive. The Crowns will allow you get a great number of boosters or customize your character with neat outfits.

Pack contains:

- Prepper "Hero" Uniform - 210 Crowns - Assault Rifle - AUR A1 + 90x ammo - Sniper Rifle - SVU + 30x ammo - Submachine gun - ADR-97 + Brush Green Skin + 150x ammo - 3x Machine Gun - RPK + Rectangle Black Skin + 225x ammo - 3x Sawed-Off Shotgun + Brush Brown Skin + 30x ammo

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.
